app

Class SystemManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.SystemManager

  • public class SystemManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class describes the core of city manager system. He is responsible for all the executation about the system operations.

      SystemManager()
      SystemManager core object constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SystemManager

        public SystemManager()
        SystemManager core object constructor. He instances the gui, data, logger and scanner classes.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public void execute()
        This method is responsible for the initial system executation. He calls other system methods that user wants.

      • removeCity

        public void removeCity()

      • createNewCity

        public void createNewCity()
        This method is responsible to store a new city in database files. He captures all object information states and after that, creates a new city object to be store at binary files database.

      • loadAllCities

        public void loadAllCities()
        This method is responsible for reading all cities objects in binary database files. He loads and shows all object states at screen for the user.

      • cityManager

        public void cityManager(java.lang.String cityName)
        This method is responsible for calls the city manager module. This module, manages all cities objects and his informations. For add, remove or edit neighborhoods, the user needs to be access here!
        Parameters:
        cityName - City name string.

      • addNewNeighborhood

        public void addNewNeighborhood(City c)
        This method is responsible for adding a new neighborhoods at any city. He captures all neighborhood states informations and after that, update city rates.
        Parameters:
        c - City object.

      • removeNeighborhood

        public void removeNeighborhood(City c)
        This method is responsible for removing a city newighborhood chosen by user. He captures the name attribute state and compares with all neighborhoods of city object. After that, it removes this neighborhood and store the changes.
        Parameters:
        c - City object.

      • editNeighborhood

        public void editNeighborhood(City c)
        This method is responsible for editing a neighborhood chosen by the user. He captures a new states attribute informations that the user wants and store the changes at binary database files.
        Parameters:
        c - City object.

      • generateStatisticsReport

        public void generateStatisticsReport(City c)

      • deleteDataFiles

        public void deleteDataFiles()
        This method when is called delete all binary database files. He does cleaning the cities directory.

      • editCity

        public void editCity()
        This method is responsible for editing a city attribute states object. He captures the attribute that user chosen to change and apply the changes into city.

      • searchCity

        public void searchCity()
        This method function is capture by the user, informations to search a city registered into the database binary files. If the search returns a valid element found, it shows to him the object attribute states, in this case, informations about the city.

      • searchNeighborhood

        public void searchNeighborhood()
        This method is responsible for searching a neighborhood in b
